    Command

    new Command(type, name, bundle, func)
    Command.js, line 13

    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    type CommandType One of the CommandTypes
    name string Name of the command
    bundle string Bundle the command came from
    func function Actual function to run when command is executed

    Methods

    execute(args, player, arg0) → {*}
    Command.js, line 29

    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    args string A string representing anything after the command itself from what the user typed
    player Player Player that executed the command
    arg0 string The actual command the user typed, useful when checking which alias was used for a command
    Returns:
    *
